title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull & manage models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders, and tool callers.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now named Open WebUI); supports RAG, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama4j – Java/JVM client
summary: Unofficial Java client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull models from Kotlin/Java.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilots – VS Code extension
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline code copilots.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat and generate code using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-models registry
summary: Community-curated list of GGUF models tested with Ollama (Llama-3, Phi-3, etc.).

title: ollama-chatbot (Streamlit)
summary: Minimal Streamlit chatbot template that talks to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Self-hosted Telegram bot that proxies chats to your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST wrapper exposing Ollama generate/chat endpoints with API keys.

title: ollama-cli (rich TUI)
summary: Terminal UI built with Rich and Textual to browse, chat and manage Ollama models.

title: ollama-csharp (.NET SDK)
summary: Community C# SDK for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ and async streaming.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside notes and summarize vault content.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-sd-webui
summary: Extension for AUTOMATIC1111 SD-WebUI that uses Ollama for prompt generation.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot bringing local Ollama models to Discord servers with slash commands.
